events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System has identified the issue as related to a refund request based on customer message.
The ticket has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further assistance on the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund, which should be processed within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the item.
Thanks for the quick response and easy refund process. I appreciate your help resolving this so quickly.
Your refund request is now completed. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and everything was satisfactory.
Since we haven’t heard back, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
